channel.title: marine heatwaves on The Ocean Code
channel.description: Recent content in marine heatwaves on The Ocean Code

item.title: Detecting marine heatwaves with sub-optimal data
item.description: Research conducted on how sub-optimal a time series may be and still produce comparable marine heatwaves to an optimal time series.

item.title: Marine heatwave tracker
item.description: A daily updating web application for tracking the occurrence of marine heatwaves around the globe.

item.title: heatwaveR: A central algorithm for the detection of heatwaves and cold-spells
Detecting marine heatwaves
item.description: A deep dive into the best practices for detecting marine heatwaves (MHWs).

item.title: heatwaveR package
item.description: An R package for the detection of heatwaves and cold-spells.
